channel.title: STEAM Aliens vs Predator Classic 2000 on Windows 7 64bit?
channel.description:
I've been wanting to buy this game for ages, but after trying out the demo on Windows 7 32bit I still couldn't get it to work.
[url]https://store.steampowered.com/app/3730/[/url]
So does anyone know if this game will work on Windows 7 64bit?
